thread.title: Idris Elba, Taylor Swift among chairs for Met Gala in May
thread.title_full: Idris Elba, Taylor Swift among chairs for Met Gala in May

title: Idris Elba, Taylor Swift among chairs for Met Gala in May
text: > Entertainment Idris Elba, Taylor Swift among chairs for Met Gala in May FILE- In this Jan. 4, 2014 file photo, Idris Elba arrives at the Palm Springs International Film Festival Awards Gala in Palm Springs, Calif. The spring exhibition at the Metropolitan Museum of Art's Costume Institute will focus on technology's impact on fashion, and the May 2, 2016 gala benefiting the institute will be co-chaired by Elba, Apple's chief design officer, Jonathan Ive, Taylor Swift and Anna Wintour. (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP, File)
